ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 904
ygData.msgSnippet: hey there i have a level 10 war with the same problem although she is humen lol, if you can get about 30 pp you can buy a ring in the baz that has serpant site
ygData.messageBody:
hey there i have a level 10 war with the same problem although she is humen lol, if you can get about 30 pp you can buy a ring in the baz that has serpant site on it  just put it on your finger and forget your sight problems:) the light stone works as well and are pretty easy too get if you ooc for one people let them rot all the time in wc and ec..
also since the new ldon exp  there are alot of higher level around that would probaly be more then willing too kill one for you:)
if haveing trouble getting 30 pp just kill the rats in wfp they have rat tails that go for about 1p a piece or kill bears for pelts the low qual ,med qual and high qual go for good pp too:) in the baz:)
Good luck and good hunting
Eudorea 64th cleric on drinal server


EudoreaCleric To Friends and Guildies Alike , Good Hunting and Stay Safe
